name: Jack Lumber (itch) (Edgar Mendoza)
description:
WASD - Move

Left Mouse Click - Chop

Esc - Pause

You play as Jack Lumber, a world renounced lumberjack tasked with clearing a not so normal forest where trees never stop growing for some reason and only have 60 seconds to do it. Just be careful to not smash any tourists or else you'll get fired and that's not good. Tourists sometimes drop apples so be sure to smash them to get extra points. Golden apples are worth even more.

Have fun.

~ Made in 3 hours for Trijam #168 ~
